text_block_list.text:
Days after the Selection Race, I came across 
Special Week in the cafeteria.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Not to mention the sauteed carrots, carrot yakisoba and carrot 
gratin… This was the best meal ever~♪

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for the wonderful food! Haaah~ The 
carrot hamburger steak was a treat!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Mhm. You had 3 heapful refills of each and every item on the 
menu, and that's all you have to say? I'm impressed ~

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: And on another front… Heeey, El, how're you holding up?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Burp… Just two servings in and I was barely keeping up… 
Spe-chan, truly a force to be reckoned with…!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Gwaah, El-chan!? What's with the painful look!?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Damn, she's getting paler and paler, yet you 
never noticed? How airheaded can you be?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
El-chan, are you sure you're going to 
be okay in your mock race later…!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Y-You can be sure I am… I may have a heavy 
belly, but I'm the undying condor…!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
… Just you wait till I get back up 
to speed when the race starts…!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
You did not plot this out from the very beginning, did you? 
Woooow, Spe-chan, you're more of a strategist than I thought~

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I didn't!! Awawa, El-chan, please, just hang in there!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Like I said, I'm okay!…Burp.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, leaving that aside, may I just ask you, 
Spe-chan, why you're still so formal with us!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
We've brought this up before! We're classmates, so just drop the 
" please"s, and ease up when talking with us!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Ah yes, I've heard that before. It's one of those moments I 
thought, "Says the girl who's about as formal…"

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
It's easier for me to speak this way so that doesn't matter! And 
let's not shift the focus away from Spe-chan here!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You have a fair poi-You right…!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, I still can't break my bad habit of stiffening up my words 
to keep my manners, whenever I get nervous.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
'Cause at first I was worried if I really 
could get along with you all… Ehehe.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
It was your first time having peers and being surrounded by 
fellow horse girls… am I right? You're weirdly reserved despite 
how approachable you are~

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Well, just ease up and chill out~! There's 
your prime example right here, see?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Wanna skip our next class and go out fishing ~?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Sei-chan levels of easing up…!? W-Will I really 
be able to… reach your level…!?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Ah, that you'd seriously ponder over, eh?

Special Week and her friends' ch it chat 
lasted throughout their mealtime…

As she seemed to have noticed me, she came 
over and struck up a conversation.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, hope your day is going well so far! Have you tried 
the carrot hamburger steak here? It's oh so good!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Never in my wildest dreams did I imagine I'd get to feast on all 
these dishes for free… Tracen Academy never ceases to amaze me!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I never thought I'd get to eat with friends either… 
Ehehe, I'm really glad I get to be here~!
choice_data_list: You seem to be enjoying it here.
You seem to be enjoying it here.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I am! El-chan, Sei-chan, Grass-chan, and also King-chan… 
Everyone was really kind to become friends with me!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
After all, friends I could chit chat with, or 
even run alongside with, were but something I 
could only yearn for when I was little.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Getting to talk and compete with everyone 
like this feels like a dream come true!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Speaking of, I sent Mom a letter, along with 
a photo of me and my classmates…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
She was thrilled to see it! "I ran all the way to our neighbour 
to show them your photo!", she replied.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
The neighbor is 5 kilometers away, and to think that Mom actually 
ran that far… What a hyper Mom I have~!

Special Week raved on. There didn't seem to be causes for concern 
about her school life, for she was raised by a loving mother to 
be forthright and kind.
-That was what I believed, until…

I came across Special Week again on that very 
day, except this time she was confronted by a 
girl with an awfully distressed look…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh…? Excuse me, can you repeat that…

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
Don't make me say it again!! In yesterday's 
mock race, I was at winning pace…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's because… I wanted… to win too… myself…

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text: But you've already found yourself a supervisor!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wha…!?

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
So is there any point in showing off in a mere mock 
race!!? You could've just let me win it…!

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
It'll be the end of the road for me! I have to 
get my ratings up, and get scouted by a trainer… 
Or else… I won't make it in time…!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: "Make it in time"…? W-What do you mean…?

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
…My mother has long been hospital bound, but recently her 
condition has been going downhill. The doctor even askedme to 
prepare for the worst.

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
She was looking forward to my debut… For all this time, she was 
rooting for me… At this rate, I won't make it in time…!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: T-That's terrible…

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
So please, I beg you, Spe-chan…! Let me win in the upcoming 
mock race, okay? Promise me, okay…?

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text: After all… We're friends… Right?

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text: …Ah, we better get ready… Let's go… Spe-chan.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …S-Sure.

In the mock race that followed, Special Week finished seventh, 
without once showing her usual agility and tenacious spurts.
